desc: Seaporium is Cape Cod's home decor and DIY supply store. We are an authorized retailer or Dixie Belle Paints and Iron Orchid Designs products. We are also a local artisan gallery and custom furniture painting studio. Come shop our selection of Vintage furniture and unique decor.

layout.text: Shop for unique vintage and hand painted furniture & decor....Art, Jewelry, Crafts... Also DIY painting and crafting products & classes
